EarmarkingModality.name: Fully flexible core contribution
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution to the aid organisation budget, fully flexible (within the boundaries set in mandates, governing body regulations etc.)

EarmarkingModality.name: Fully flexible core contribution to the CERF
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution to CERF budget, fully flexible within the CERF regulations.

EarmarkingModality.name: Core contribution
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution to a significant part of the aid organisation’s mandate, e.g. restricted to the humanitarian operations of a double-mandated organisation.

EarmarkingModality.name: Core contribution with limitations
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution, but with exclusions pertaining to a small number of specific countries.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed to a geographical region or a strategic objective
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution, fully flexible within the boundaries of the strategic objective (e.g. health or education) or region (e.g. Africa).

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed to a Country-Based Pooled Fund
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution directed to a specific Country-Based Pooled Fund, otherwise fully flexible.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed to an aid organiastion’s country operations
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution, directed to a specific country, otherwise fully flexible.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed to sub-objective/targe
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution, directed to subcategories of strategic objectives, e.g. health/malaria or education /teacher training, but without geographical limitations.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed to a specific project
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution directed to a specific project in a specific country.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed geographically and thematically, tied financial
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution, tied to certain conditions in terms of purchase restrictions, directed to a specific country/region and to a specific objective. E.g. financial contribution for purchase of ABC for school feedingin X-land.

EarmarkingModality.name: Directed geographically and thematically, in kind
EarmarkingModality.description: In-kind contribution directed to a specific country/region andto a specific objective. E.g. ricefor school feedingin X-land.

EarmarkingModality.name: Donor-initiated projects/directed contributions
EarmarkingModality.description: Financial contribution coupled with the demand for a specific project in a specific country fulfilling donor priorities.
